LDNDC

Most up-to-date information from LandscapeDNDC can be found here, as well as the authors,
users guide and documentation of the model: https://ldndc.imk-ifu.kit.edu/index.php

Obtaining LDNDC program requires credentials, which one is able to request from the
authors of the model. With the credentials, the pre-compiled LDNDC program can be
downloaded here: https://ldndc.imk-ifu.kit.edu/download/download-model.php

Instructions for setting up the LDNDC simulations are described in the users guide.
